text: Linwood M. Higgins (born January 11, 1948) is an American politician from Maine. Higgins, a Republican from Scarborough, served 8 terms (1974-1990) in the Maine House of Representatives. From 1980 to 1984, Higgins served as Minority Leader of the Maine House. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:People from Scarborough, Maine Category:Maine Republicans Category:Minority Leaders of the Maine House of Representatives
title: Linwood M. Higgins
